directions: In a blender or food processor, coarsely chop the garlic, chile peppers, and green beans. Mix in the papaya, and process into small chunks. Mix in the tomato, fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar. Process the mixture until soft and slightly chunky. Transfer to a medium bowl. Stir in the peanuts. Cover, and refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: 6 green beans, cut into 1 inch pieces
1 large unripe papaya, peeled and cut into thin strips
2 tablespoons finely chopped unsalted, dry-roasted peanuts
title: Green Papaya Salad
